summary: A documentary around the world looking for young italians who had left the country. From Paris to London, from Bergen to Wien, from Tenerife to NY, six stories of ordinary separation, one question: what happened to Italy?
cast: Chiara Bernasconi|Anna Binetti|Camilla Bonetti|Chiara Capraro|Nicola Cataldo|Bill Emmott|Brunella Filì|Mauro Gargano|Alessia Gatti|Marco Lanza|Andrea Lodovichetti|Milena Maselli|Patrizia Pierazzo
title: Emergency Exit: Young Italians Abroad
